name: Rave Non Stop
description:
Listen to the music and touch the characters never stop dancing!. Complete the levels to have a bigger crowd and become the ultimate DJ!!!. What are you waiting for? Enjoy this fantastic dance game with funny characters!!!

Help our cute friends continue dancing by tapping them with your finger!
Enjoy the way they dance!!
They have signature moves!!
Hurry up!! they get tired and if they fall asleep you lose.

Unlock new RAVES and have more fun!
